website_summaries.verdict: An iconic style that has many dedicated followers.
pros: We love how the steel shank offers support and stability while a lightweight sole adds cushioning
The Fatbaby range comes in a variety of colors and contrasting stitching
Roomy toe box, and the supple leather breaks in easily
There's also a super cute toddler version
cons: Sizing tends to be inconsistent between styles

customer_reviews.title: Some 11s will fit fine and 10s are too small
customer_reviews.text: This particular boot is a light brown suede and the fit is large. I’m one of those 10 1/2 size women’s size so it’s tricky with Ariat boots. Some 11s will fit fine and 10s are too small. In this case, the 11s were too big and the 10s were perfect. If you love the style and wish they were a tad darker, just use some mink oil on them to protect them and they turn to a nice shade of brown. I love Ariats, but it is a challenge to find a great fit. In this case, I hit the jackpot! Here’s a picture after I used mink oil on them. Perfect shade and perfect fit!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon4ever

customer_reviews.title: Absolute amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have got a wide foot and never have been able to find boots that fit, and I was told to check these out. When I first got them they looked narrow, but they fit great and are oh so comfy... And the picture does no justice! They are beautiful! If you have a wide foot, just go up one size 😉 I'll definitely be ordering more...
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Higgins

customer_reviews.title: ... these 4 times and they are already broken in good. At first they were a little tough to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these 4 times and they are already broken in good. At first they were a little tough to get on and felt a little snug around my toes. A couple wears and we are ready to rock and roll. Love them. It is tough for me to find boots that fit me well. Depending on the shoe I can be a any where between a size 11 and 12. I was blessed with some huge feet and wide calves. These are great on my feet and wide calves and I ordered a size 11. I hope that helps someone.
customer_reviews.author: April S.

customer_reviews.title: I love my Ariat Fatbaby boots!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to replace an identical pair that I bought in 2007. These have a different insole and a better tread on the bottom. Fit runs true to size, maybe a bit larger but not by enough to make a difference. I do recommend ordering your regular size. These are well made and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: but fully satisfied. I opened the box and there was a ...
customer_reviews.text: These beauties just arrived at my front door. I must say, I was a little shocked they came a day early, but fully satisfied. I opened the box and there was a shoe box inside, inside of the shoe box were two beautifully wrapped boots which upon further inspection were clear of any blemishes and imperfections. I am so happy I ordered these babies! They fit like a dream, perfectly wide around my lower calf--my legs are muscular and wide--and I ordered the 9.5 B MEDIUM because of the reviews about how they fit a little smaller than they should. This is very true, I normally wear a 9, but the 9.5 fits perfectly. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Christina Huffman

customer_reviews.title: I really love these boots though
customer_reviews.text: They fell apart on me after only 8 months. Ripped at the seem. Since my previous ariat boots lasted over 4 years with heavy use I was expecting the same from these. I really love these boots though. They are so comfortable. I want to get another pair but I'm hesitant since I need a boot that can hold up with heavy barn work.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Panariello

customer_reviews.title: Best waterproof ariats!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. I got them on sale for $36!! That's right for Ariat boots. Here's my little secret...when u want something add it to the cart & save for later. This way you can monitor the price increases/decreases and know when to pounce on a great deal. Hold up great in the barn, mud, quad riding. This is the 3rd pair I bought!
customer_reviews.author: John Manos

customer_reviews.title: First cowboy boots/First Ariats - I'm sold!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these! My first Ariats. I love the sole, the most, because there's absolutely no way I'm slipping in these, on the wet NW grass. I wear an 8, and got an 8 1/2 (just in case), so they're just a tad big, but that leaves sock room for Winter. An 8 would have been perfect. After they're broken in a bit (just wore them out to work on the horse field - great for work/comfortable), I'm going to add waterproofing. Considering I never wear cowboy boots, and these are my first pair, I have to say I'm duly impressed. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara K. Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Ariat Fat babies. I love the overall look of these boots and I am not disappointed. I ordered my usual size (6) and they fit great. I definitely recommended them.
customer_reviews.author: Rylee Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Hate these boots & how they fit!
customer_reviews.text: I've always worn Ariat boots for many, many years but these were the worst fitting boots I've received. The arch is shallow and makes it hard to get the boot on. My heal gets sores because the boot doesn't seem to be my size (I've always worn a size 11 Ariat boot but this is the first boot I've had problems with). The material seems to be similar to my other Ariat boots but these are taking a LONG time to stretch out to fit my foot. Make sure you can try these on before buying them. Hate these boots and feel like I've wasted my money because I can't wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Love My Labs

customer_reviews.title: Mixed bag...
customer_reviews.text: Follow up review - Sorry these didn't work as they were just so pretty. Started off a 5 star and knocked down to 3 star. Unfortunately the fit wasn't the same as my previous fatbaby boots, top was too stiff, they seemed a bit narrower and the insole was not removable. If you have slender feet and wear your jeans/leggings tucked, they could work for you. Love them! Comfortable right out of the box. I have worn my old fatbaby boots for over 7 years...a lot. This style has a thinner sole, but hope to love just as much.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Smarty Pants

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a pair of Ariats after hearing a recommendation for the brand. I was told they were comfortable and worth their price tag. They really ARE comfortable and worth the price! I threw them on the moment they arrived and was thrilled at how comfortable the footbed was. I wore them all day long and they were perfect! No hotspots, no rubbing, no aching feet! I will say that they are looser on my feet, but I usually go up a half size in boots to be safe. The best recommendation that I can give, is that I just ordered another pair after one day of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: easy return.
customer_reviews.text: Very stiff leather. These boots were very uncomfortable and not flexible at all. They also run narrow. I had to return them however, easy return.
customer_reviews.author: Mommasita

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoe or boot ever worn!
customer_reviews.text: I've been in the shoe business some 35 years...I have a huge shoe/boot collection. I can honestly say that these boots are a great fit and COMFORTABLE! They have a comfort system insole and they are a very soft leather. Snug through the instep, heel cup is perfect and ball of the foot is in the proper place. If I'm casual, these boots are on my feet! Best purchase I've made in a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Toe too tight and heel way too loose.
customer_reviews.text: The boots are cute. I bought them for my daughter who wears a size 4.5 In kids or a size 6.5 in Womens. I ordered a 6.5 and my daughter immediately upon trying on reported that they are comfy on the bottom and are the right length but the toe is a bit snug and the heel so loose she is sure she would lose a boot when mounting her horse or mucking out stalls. Upon checking her heel was moving up and down in the boot as she walked. Returned for a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Makes Feet Happy
customer_reviews.text: These are hands down my favorite boots, and I wear them basically always. The foot part breaks in fast, and they're delightfully comfortable. The thing that makes them superior is that the tops are soft. I have bought others that fit my feet fine but the tops are too stiff and it makes them uncomfortable and look weird in my jeans. But these have been great! Oh, they might run a little big. I normally wear a 12, and in these boots an 11 fit perfect. Which is great for me, bc it sucks shopping for 12s of anything. I therefore also recommend not having such big feet. Best wishes in this regard.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Well made and comfortable FIRST WEAR!
customer_reviews.text: Love these for sliding on and heading to work or shopping! Great arch support for us "high arch"folks! Too pretty to muck any stalls! HA! (if I HAD any!!lol!) Ariat makes great footwear! Saw a friend with these on and just had to get a pair! She also LOVED the fit and they look so cute on your feet! Too, if you are petite in hight, they are a great proportion for us shorties under 5'4" Makes us look TALLER!!
customer_reviews.author: Laure

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, sassy, classy
customer_reviews.text: These are a must if you have trouble finding boots because your calves are to big for other boots, but you want to look good and show off ,this is it!! I have 2 other pairs in different colors. Skinny jeans and a top to match your boots and you are ready to work or party 👍
customer_reviews.author: Sf

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, Appearance, Quality, Price
customer_reviews.text: I wear boots different brands of boots often and received my first Ariat Fatbaby boots in black/orchid for my birthday recently. They are absolutely beautiful and when I put them on they immediately felt like I had been wearing them forever. I am in my 60's with several foot issues and I was thrilled to find these are without a doubt the most comfortable boots I have ever worn. I wore them to work the day after receiving them and even at the end of a very long day there was no discomfort anywhere. These will be my go to boots for future purchases, my feet are so very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to replace a pair I had worn out. I loved that pair. Wore them for everyday, dress, any occasion. Even though these say they are the same style number as my boots, they are a completely different fit, feel and the colors are different. I guess Ariat changed the style. I am sending these back. I don't like the new ones at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these boots
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these boots. Based on the reviews, I ordered a half size up from my regular shoe size. I have am 5' tall with a wide foot and calf, and usually wear a 7 or 7 wide in sneakers and shoes. I ordered a 7.5, and they are perfect in fit and height. Within one hour they feel like they are made for my feet. I needed more nimble footing in the paddock with our yearling miniature horses. I debated long and hard between styles and brands, and am very happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: L. Saunders

customer_reviews.title: There are other better options
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about these boots because Ariat boots have always been so comfortable but these are not what i would expect typically from Ariat. First the hole you put your foot in is very narrow and you really got to put some effort into pulling them on, once on they are comfy. I was hoping they would get easier to put on after a some time but they have not. Another issue is the black on toes are already toes of the boots is flaking off. I wear these to work but I've always worn Justin and have never had this issue. So overall these boots are not worth it. I'll go back to wearing Justin's.
customer_reviews.author: Korri Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of boots that I have purchased this year. The first in January and my new pair just came today. I wore Justin’s for most of my life and they were able to stand the test of time against serious wear and tear. However, the last few years it seams as though the quality has declined while the price inclined. Good price, good quality, very comfortable, and they come in a wide, perfect for those of us that have flinstone feet. Very happy with this product. Also, they probably would have lasted longer had I done my work of oiling and not letting the dog get ahold of them.
customer_reviews.author: AMOS COUNTRY

customer_reviews.title: I love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: I basically ordered these boots to try on because they were on sale. I did not expect to keep them but , I LOVE THEM! They fit just right! I'm a 7 1/2. They were a little bit tight sliding my foot in, but after wearing them 3 days they loosened up and their a perfect fit with a medium weight sock. Very satisfied with this purchase and I think they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Grayson

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife about a yr ago. She works outside alot in on the property and they still look almost new. The leather is top-notch. And very easy to clean. We both abuse our work boots and We are extremely impressed with these boots.
customer_reviews.author: john d woofter

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made! Painful!
customer_reviews.text: Qaulty is disappointing. Worth about 20 bucks. I wouldn't buy these even if they were that price. Thought I was getting a deal, boy was I wrong. They are extremely uncomfortable and were not made equally as a pair. They seem like nock offs. They are plastic. Sure they are pretty but not for long!!! Amazon is making it right though so I will continue my business with them. If Ariats quality has went to this then I will never purchase then again.
customer_reviews.author: ALASKAN PONIES

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but I do love them.
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute... I was thinking of returning at first even though I loved the fit and the way they look... width on calf seemed too big and bulky. I still wish they were a little narrower, but with super thin sock they just get over my high arch. But once in, my feet move around a little too much. When I stretch them out a little, I hope I can get them on with a bulky sock. Will be perfect for winter. They look great with a pair of pants tucked in.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L. Brandenburg

customer_reviews.title: Slimmer than average and higher arch, but very cute and great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I am not a wide foot in any boots or shoes I wear- but these were extra snug in the middle of the foot/arch area. The arch was higher than average and the boot is slimmer than average. I had to return because I didn’t want to take the chance at “breaking them in” only to have them still not fit right and be uncomfortable. HOWEVER, if they fit right- they’re great quality and I could see would be durable and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap compared to my Fatbaby boots
customer_reviews.text: I can feel a considerable difference in quality and comfort with this particular Ariat boot. I have 7 pairs of Ariat boots ranging from cowboy boots, English riding boots, Fatbaby boots and now these. My little girl has wore nothing but Ariat also for the past 5 years. I bought these for everyday wear around my horse property. These are by far the lowest quality and not to the standard of Ariat boots in general. These are more at the level of a Justin boot. The inside of the heel of the boot does not feel supportive and the boot overall is thinner. I wear nothing but Ariat so this was a disappointing product. The pink is cute though!
customer_reviews.author: Terry-Anne

customer_reviews.title: Get these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots . I bought these because I needed some work boots. They fit great. The soul has a great cushion and the boot has a great support. There was almost no break in period at all. I can wear the boots with socks or no socks. I love these boots so much I bought them in black. The boots are so comfy that when we went on vacation I wanted to bring these boots (even thought they are beat up) instead of ny nice knee high zip boots.
customer_reviews.author: ABear Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Super super super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are my go-to footwear when I can't decide what to wear. They go to the grocery store, into the garden, into the garage with me and I forget I'm even wearing them. Super comfortable. Can slip them on without using my hands. LOTS of compliments. Now, I did return the actual pair I ordered from here because I didn't like the color, but bought the same style and brand from a local store.
customer_reviews.author: Information Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Runs Large ... And Small?
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, these didn't fit. I used the sizing chart, but they were still too large in the heel (tons of slipping) and yet too tight in the bridge of the foot. Very strange fit, and I've never had cowboy boots that fit so differently in different parts of the foot. Returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful foot protection and really cute boots.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Ariat Fatbabies. I love these boots so much. They are great for working outdoors. When I have these on, I feel like I have little tanks on my feet. I have no fear - my feet are protected from mud, snakes, sharp twigs, nails, broken boards, or poison ivy! Clean-up is a breeze. I've even just hosed them off if I am in a hurry. They are amazingly comfortable. But one of the most remarkable things about these boots is how cute they are. I rarely fail to get a compliment when I wear these out and about. I love my Fatbabies!
customer_reviews.author: bootsie mcq

customer_reviews.title: I am in LOVE with These Boots
customer_reviews.text: I needed to get a new pair of boots and it took me some time to settle on which pair to get. I loved how these boots looked so I decided I would give them a try. I am SO HAPPY I bought these boots. I wear them almost daily. They are So comfortable. I can wear them doing a lot of walking and never once have they hurt me. I will be getting another pair of these without a doubt!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel L. Hester

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE love these boots! I went to the store, and tried on a lot of different boots. I normally wear a true size 8, but in the store, the 8's were a little on the short side (my big toe touched the end), so I went online, saw these, took a chance and ordered them in an 8 1/2 and they are perfect. Very comfortable and cute. My husband loved them. I got the black, which are cute in the photo, but even cuter in person. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots, they are so comfortable and I’ve had them for a year now and they are my everyday boots. The first couple days they did feel wierd but I broke them in pretty fast and I get compliments on them all the time. I would highly recommend them!!! I ordered a nine and they fit perfectly and I normally wear a 9.5/10 in sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: nice boots
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these boots, they are adorable. I now understand why my friends rave about them :) These are the newer version with the soles that are safe to ride in. I have not ridden in them yet though. I have wide feet, so I took the suggestion to order a size up and they are pretty comfy. I usually wear an 8.5 wide, the 9.5 in this boot fits. The nylon-ish socks I was wearing wore through and gave me a little mark on my leg from all of the walking I did with them on the day I got them, but my feet didn't hurt and that is just unthinkable for brand new shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Heather A

customer_reviews.title: Fake boots, cheapest of cheap!
customer_reviews.text: These are the fake ariat boots that are sold in Cheap places like Walmart. The lineing is done in a polyester (cheap) material and the boot has a cheap crepe sole. It also walks funny. I can't imagine riding in these as the interior would rub through first time out. Real ariat boots are lined in leather! These were returned!
customer_reviews.author: cbottrun

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th pair of Ariats, so I knew what size to get. They are a little tight when you get them, but loosen up. I have a wide foot and usually wear a 6-6.5, but have to buy a 7.5 in Ariats. These do not have loops on the sides to pull them on. The "loops" are for looks only and are sewn down so you can't put your fingers through. That's a little annoying, but otherwise the tooling and colors are just like the picture and I love them.
customer_reviews.author: jkmaynard

customer_reviews.title: Narrow!
customer_reviews.text: These are ADORABLE. However, they are incredibly narrow. They also have a weird fit, hugging your midfoot but looseygoosey in the back. The arch support lifts your foot up into the top of the boot, feeling like you don't have much room. Odd fit for me, but then it could just be my wonky feet.
customer_reviews.author: Hk

customer_reviews.title: How Do You Even Get Them On!?!
customer_reviews.text: How in the world do you even get these things on!?! I finally got the right one on after a lot of sweating and pulling and trying different socks, only to have the actual boot be too big in length once I got it on. Never could get the left one on at all. And my left foot is a tad smaller than my right so no idea how the right one eventually went on and this one just wouldn’t. I’m super upset because I was so excited about these and they are just what I was looking for. I don’t even know if trying another size would work. So so bummed.
customer_reviews.author: MissyBee

customer_reviews.title: Love them, so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Well I had to return these the first time I ordered. I normally wear a 7.5 and I was reading lots of reviews saying to size up, now I should mention I've never bought cowboy boots before so I don't know how they normally should fit but I originally ordered the 7.5. Anyway it ended up being too big so I returned them and then ordered the 7. Honestly I probably could of fit in the 6.5! But after a week or so of wearing them they fit great and I love how comfortable they are!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Love my new boots! Sz 10 normally a 10.5.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered for a wedding. Will be perfect. I normally wear a 10.5 in tennis shoes. These are a size 10. They were a little snug at first and hard to get past the heal but once I got them on the first time it got easier. I had to have a seat and pull on both sides of the boot with a little muscle and my foot slid right in.. I have a wider foot and chubby calves and was concerned if these would fit and they did. They go about half way up the calf.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot! Love the dark chocolate color against the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Boot! Love the dark chocolate color against the blue. Very comfortable. Only gave me one blister from the first couple days of wearing them (which isn't bad for boots). I have had them for about a week, worn them everyday, and haven't had any more problems with blisters, etc. True to size. My last pair of boots (bought 2 years ago, different design) were the same size, brand, and style (Fatbaby) as these boots and they fit exactly the same.
customer_reviews.author: eag_99

customer_reviews.title: Love them- but they do feel larger than normal
customer_reviews.text: Love them- but they do feel larger than normal. I usually wear a size 11 in boots but with these I could almost wear a 10 I think. They are extremely wide (I have a wide foot and found these to be excessive). However with thick socks, they’re great. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: tacs12

customer_reviews.title: Made small..
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 9.5 but was sent a 10. I was confused about that but I tried them on anyways. I'm usually between a 9-10 in shoes but even the 10 was way too tight. Went to check online for an 11 and there were none available. Not sure I would have switched out for a larger size since an 11 might not even work, plus these were really bulky and more for working out in the field or riding. I sent them back, oh well! Cute shoes but you probably need tog o up a size or two depending!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small, tight, and inflexible... SO disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying for weeks to break these in; I have another pair that is exactly the same but with a different pattern on the upper and they fit perfectly. These do not! They are SO small and tight. the heel is so rigid I have to use a horn to get my foot inside. Putting them on is so difficult, the boot has scraped off the skin on the top of my foot on numerous occasions, causing bruising and even bleeding. Once the boots are on and they warm up, they are fine; but getting them on and tolerating them until the leather starts to flex is torture. Would not buy again or recommend, unfortunately :(. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Wren Archer

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I got the dark brown and turquoise. My first pair of cowboy boots and I absolutely love them! I probably could've ordered a smaller size as I am usually between sizes. But I was wary about ordering shoes online. Even still, these still fit are so comfortable. The quality is amazing! I wear them all the time now lol I want the light brown and pink ones next :)
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny and will buy again!!
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier with these boots. They are comfortable, do not make my feet hurt after an hour or two. I get lots of compliments on them and Get to show the pride in my country too. Love Love Love Ariat Fat Baby Boots! They are literally all I wear to work and I walk all day (warehouse work). Absolutely recommend you buy them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Really cute, comfortable boots.
customer_reviews.text: My boots arrived this morning and I wore them all day in the house to see how they fit. Very comfortable. The rounded toe works great for my feet and the lower height of the boot is perfect for people with short legs like me. The sole has some give to it so they were more comfortable to walk in than my leather soled boots. I like the color of the leather as well as the embroidery thread color. Hopefully they will hold up well in the barnyard and on the trail. I ordered my normal shoe size (7) and they fit me just right.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots, Sad about the new sole
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Ariat Fatbaby boots for years because they are sturdy, comfortable, have a wide toe box and are super cute. However, this iteration of Fatbaby boots they changed the sole from a rubber, rugged sole to one that doesn't have nearly the grip of ones in the past. I've checked other Ariat products and it seems to be a brand-wide change. The uppers still feel nice, with good quality leather, but come on, Ariat! Why would you put a plastic composite on the sole of a leather boot?
customer_reviews.author: Soybert

customer_reviews.title: 1/2 size too small. Order up.
customer_reviews.text: These were beautiful! Smelled great, looked great. My only complaint was too small. I’m normally an 8 1/2 which is what I ordered but it was too tight. The neck was pretty narrow and hard to get my foot in but once my foot was in...it did fit....just cramped. I walked around for a few minutes and sadly decided I needed the next size up. Other than that, BEAUTIFUL well made boots!!! Can’t wait to get my new pair!!
customer_reviews.author: DMAT

customer_reviews.title: ... got these boots for christmas and they are absolutely BEAUTIFUL!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these boots for christmas and they are absolutely BEAUTIFUL!!! They do run small but it is simple and quick for an exchange. I am completely satisfied with these boots. (And that's saying a lot for this wide-footed girl!)
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so adorable! They are are very pretty too. They have pink stitching on the sides; so girly! I love them! They are wide and very comfortable. I’m usually a size 6 but ordered a 6 1/2 because I wanted extra room for wool sox and I have neuropathy in my feet, and these are dreamy. Fat baby definitely has its meaning with these sweet little cowgirl boots! I can’t wait to wear them!
customer_reviews.author: Rita M.

customer_reviews.title: Fatbaby Boots Are SO Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots in a size 10B, which is a half-size larger than I normally buy most shoes. However, Ariat boots seem to run a bit smaller than other boots I've owned. I have high arches, and discovered that Ariat boots are comfortable for me for long periods of time -- great for dancing and cavorting in the woods, or wearing when I plan to be on feet all day. I love the colors, and will definitely buy more of these boots in the future.
customer_reviews.author: M. Carter

customer_reviews.title: So narrow could not even get my foot into them!
customer_reviews.text: This boot is wayyy to small! For a size 11 I could not believe how small they are. I couldn’t even get my foot in because of how narrow It is ! I haven even tried using a shoe stretcher for any help but the leather is so stiff . When I finally do get my foot in the fit is fine but I literally have to shove my foot in it with all my strength! I have bought boots from this brand before but I have never had this issue before! If you have any type of a wide foot do not buy these ! So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing change, now too big
customer_reviews.text: Ariat now does the “generously cut” thing with their sizing, meaning if you wear a 5.5 you will no longer be able to wear their shoes because they will be too big. I used to wear Ariats and loved their boots for yard work, but I can no longer wear them due to their sizing change. My old 5.5 Ariats said they were a 35 Euro. My new 5.5 Ariats say they are a Euro 36. I had to return the boots as they are simply too large. Time to find a new brand.
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I have another pair of Ariats but they are so different from these. The material on these seems thin & poor quality, the fit way loose even though it was my normal boot size. I also just didn’t like the look of them, they were ugly in person with the heel and snubbed toe. Returned. I’ll go to Boot Barn or something and get the Justin’s I really wanted anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: ... lived in for years but the sole is getting pretty worn out so I ordered these
customer_reviews.text: I have an old pair of Ariat Fatbaby boots that I have lived in for years but the sole is getting pretty worn out so I ordered these. They are way more decorative than my older pair but fun. The soles are not the same style as my older ones and are less supportive. Overall, I am happy with them but would have rather them be more like my older ones as far as the thicker sole goes. Not sure if these are going to last as long as the older pair I have. I can't wear them as long and be as comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: oldbones216

customer_reviews.title: Love Ariat Fatbaby boots!!
customer_reviews.text: I love them I just got my new ones in today :D I took a picture with my old favorite pair. I put those bad boys through a lot and they kept together. Loving my new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Great boot but not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been searching for a good looking short boot with an aggressive work sole. These are are them! Only negative feedback is that they are NOT waterproof as advertised, they are barely water-resistant. I walk through grasses in the morning covered in morning dew. I need waterproof boots, so sprayed them with silicone and they are now exactly what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is a strange one, but once you figure it out, these are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a Size 8 in athletic shoes and my Ariat English paddock boots are a Size 8 as well. I needed a pair of boots for barn work and decided on these for the summer because they are a lower height. I ordered a Size 8.5 because of many of the reviews. WAY too big. I exchanged them for a Size 8. Still too big. Then got a Size 7.5 and they are perfect. I love the thick lug sole and the round toe.
customer_reviews.author: EllieP

customer_reviews.title: I will NEVER buy Justins again ONLY ARIAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a commited owner of Justins boots for EVER this is my first pair of Ariats. I've always struggled with the break-in period of the Justins and the blisters ughhhh. But these boots I received were already supple and had no blisters through my first use! Only complaint is the toe box could've been a little wider and I have narrow feet but prefer a spacey toe area. I'm an ARIAT only from now on though!
customer_reviews.author: B. Kellum

customer_reviews.title: Right size, durable, comfortable, made well
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't too happy with the leather. Wearing them for yard work and doing other outside work, they get to looking bad. Have to polish them before wearing the next day. My other boots have a slick finish, and just have to wipe the dust off. These boots feel great on my feet, it's just hard to keep them looking great. These boots are my work boots mainly, so it's not that big of a deal. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Turpin

customer_reviews.title: Need to break in more.
customer_reviews.text: I got these boots for work. They are composite toe and not steel toe as described so I can get through the metal detector. After reading reviews I ended up going up a half size. I have a wider foot so they pinch my toe a little. They are not made for walking around all day. I have yet to wear them a full 8 hour shift. They are hard to break in and for me they rub on the side of my ankle so I have to shove an extra sock in there to push the seem out. They are suede so they will be harder to weather proof. They look cute though!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for everyday wear!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. I haven’t worn any other pair of shoes since I bought them! I wear size 7 regular in tennis shoes and heels and flats but I got 7.5 regular and they fit perfect, thick or thin or even two pair of socks. The ONLY disappointment is they’re not at all water resistant, even with two heavy coats of mink oil paste they leak when I walk in an inch of snow or a rain puddle. The description doesn’t mention they are water resistant so I can’t say this is a complaint, just disappointed. Other than that, I LOVE THESE BOOTS!
customer_reviews.author: carrie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Exchange sizes, and Great looking boot!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old has a strong love for Ariat boots unfortunately we don't have many options for here where we live, we ordered her a size taking a guess at what would fit based off her old boot. We ordered the incorrect size, the exchange was fast easy and painless and we had the exchange in less than two days! She loves the color of these boots they look very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 other pairs of boots similar to these ones, same brand all the same size. I was really excited to get these ones to add to my collection. But getting them I couldn’t even fit my foot into the boot. I ordered a size 9 and they fit me like a size 7 would. I like these boots because I have very wide feet and this is the only brand that fits my foot. If you have Bertie feet these will probably fit like they should. If you have wide feet keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Latham

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality they used to be
customer_reviews.text: Remember when Atiats lasted forever? These however have started to fall apart after only 2 weeks... it may only be the fake leather coming off the boot straps..but still this isn't the quality I'm used to with ariats
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great boots.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these. She tried them on at 3 different stores and decided she wanted them. I got on Amazon and found them way cheaper. They were delivered in 2 days and she already has horse s**t on them. She says they are really comfortable and perfect for riding, working around the farm or going out.
customer_reviews.author: Ducky Brown

customer_reviews.title: Whenever one pair wears out I buy another and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Whenever one pair wears out I buy another and the old pair becomes yard work worthy. They're inexpensive and I need adequate footwear for my job. I'm a supinator (I walk on the outsides of my feet) so the heel tends to wear unevenly but I get my money's worth out of them.
customer_reviews.author: DIY-ish

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Everyday Boots
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these boots as I needed a good pair of slip ons that I didn’t mind getting dirty. I live in Alaska and we’re just now starting to hit spring which means breakup season with mud and water. These have become my go to boots for literally everything whether it’s going to the store, running errands around town, or just walking the dogs. Not just for “work” or only because they’re for “cowgirls”. I read several reviews that the size was off or to order up/down but mine fit true to size 100%
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I originally got a size 10, a little snug. So I returned for an 11, they were huge, didn't seem like the great quality boot that Ariat makes. The box was even different. So I am very sad to say I am returning them. I have never had a bad experience with Ariat boots, and I am very suspicious of this pair I received.
customer_reviews.author: norman

customer_reviews.title: a good boot with some problems..
customer_reviews.text: this boot is very comfortable..the top and sole are very sturdy and long wearing..i only wish they had used better quality materials for the lining and piping...the cheap plastic trim on the outside of the boot wears out quickly as does the inferior lining material..so i have a pair of boots in good shape leather and sole wise, but look rather shabby because of the above mentioned items..ariat if youre listening kindly address these problems to make your fatbaby boot a truly quality product..
customer_reviews.author: W. Silver

customer_reviews.title: Love the Fit; Comfortable and Cute
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and cute, these boots fit well right out of the box. I've gotten compliments on them and find them very practical as well. The Ariat Fatbaby Boots are easy to walk and stand in. They're great for my wide-ish feet--I've never been found pointy toed boots comfortable. I bought these after have a previous pair in black/orchid several years ago and noticing how well they've help up and how much I enjoy wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Lives2read

customer_reviews.title: Perfection in a boot good enough for both chores AND riding.
customer_reviews.text: I never EVER have to break in a pair of Ariats. These are just amazing. I do barn work AND ride in these. They are SO comfortable and well worth the money. I always waterproof them, either with a boot spray or mink oil, and they last for several years. I typically wear an 8.5-9 and bought the 9. So glad I did! They fit just right. I will always buy Ariats. So perfect!
customer_reviews.author: MKelly

customer_reviews.title: Just like my old ones..Durable!
customer_reviews.text: With so many styles of Fatbaby boots now...it took me a long time to find a pair just like my 8 yr old pair....these are identical. Same great fit and durability. The old ones were worn everywhere...in the snow, water, barn etc...and only just this yr split on the side. ( I treat them with waterproofing )
customer_reviews.author: Grammy59

customer_reviews.title: Comfort & style are the trademarks of this boot!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of the Ariat Fat Baby. At the moment, I own 6 different Fat Baby styles. My feet are not narrow & I have one pair of extra wide. But, the medium width is fine & I just get that. These boots WILL stretch. Put on an extra pair of thick socks & begin 2 stretch them, if needed. The Fat Baby is roomier, in the toe, than most other boots. I really love my Fat Baby boots & they look awesome. Lots of styles to choose from. Let er buck....!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These cowgirl boots are INCREDIBLY NARROW, and B size is all that is offered. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: My child cant put her 7 year old foot in a cowboy boot that is a woman's 5.5. What a shame. These boots are 2 sizes bigger than what she wears currently, and this seller is sending out these narrow B width boots knowing that buyers are unaware of the actual narrowness of them. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Boots!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a brown pair a couple years ago and they are still in good shape, even after daily wear, for months and months! Only reason I ordered new ones is because the black matches more of my wardrobe. My feet no longer hurt after a long day. I wear these boots everywhere! Work, church, the beach, the river, fishing, camping, shopping, dressed up, dressed down; these boots are AMAZING! Plus, there was a discount when I ordered them. If you're on the fence, DO IT!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Singleton

customer_reviews.title: Great boots for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted to go to horse camp this summer and they told her she needed boots with heels on them. The boots in stores are twice as expensive as this pair, but they're very similar in quality! One of the helpers at camp (someone who's been taking riding lessons for a couple years) had the exact same boots. They're sturdy, comfortable, and affordable. Win win!
customer_reviews.author: C&A Allen

customer_reviews.title: Better than Justin's
customer_reviews.text: Before these I had a similar pair of Justin's. The Justin's were great but the Ariat's are better. There is a little more arch support in these and they don't become as loose on your foot over time. I actually have 2 pairs of these that I use for work and they do a great job. I'm on my feet and moving a lot during work and my feet don't hurt or get tired. These haven't worn or broke even after so much use. They also look great; I don't know how many compliments I get from these boots every day.
customer_reviews.author: Synne

customer_reviews.title: left boot fine - right boot too tight
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful boots -I especially love the rubber sole....but when I tried them on I could only get the left boot on.No matter how I tried, the instep was too tight.to get the right boot on ..so regretfully I had to send them back. They were a little stiff and rubbed against my ankle so I am going to try another pair . I ordered my regular size 6 - so maybe I will try a 6 and 1/2 this time....
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Really Happy with Fatbaby 2 Boots!
customer_reviews.text: The boots were a day late arriving. I usually receive my Amazon items on time or early. They came the next day, fit beautifully as though they were made just for me. They are cute and stylish, my husband loves them. I can't wait for his to come. I hope his fit as well as mine and that he is as pleased as I am.
customer_reviews.author: Fe

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: I tried a pair on in the store to check the sizing. I'm glad I did. For me they run a bit small. If you like a tight fit then order your normal size. I normally wear a 10 but ordered an 11 because of how tight they fit around the middle of the foot. I'm glad I did. Once they broke in i wear a thicker sock and they fit great. The length seems correct too. Gives my toes a bit of room but my foot doesn't slide around in them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: OBSESSED with this comfortable cute boot!
customer_reviews.text: OBSESSED with these boots. I needed riding boots for safe and comfortable horseback riding and not only are they the perfect boot but super fashionable and fun. I first put them on and walked a mile to try them. Just as comfortable as a sneaker. Don’t wear a super thick sock. I wore cotton trouser socks that were perfect for this boot. I love them so much, I will wear them any time, not just for riding. So in love with them! All leather and price super reasonable!
customer_reviews.author: akdel

customer_reviews.title: So I got 11s think that would be best since I would always be wearing socks
customer_reviews.text: I am a tall woman. 5’9” I used to wear size 10 but after each baby, my feet grew. So now I’m a weird size 10.5 ish. So I got 11s think that would be best since I would always be wearing socks. The boots are SO nice but a bit big on me. They are beautiful and so well made. I can sometimes find boots that make my big feet look small. However, this is not the case. These make my big feet look BIG. Word to the wise. Order your size. They are a really nice boot other than being a little floppy. That’s totally my fault for ordering a half size too big.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these boots!!!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are just perfect, and that is saying a lot. I have narrow feet and a high arch, and these fit really well. I eventually did put some insoles inside, but that really wasnt necessary. They are easy to put on and pull off, and they have kept my feet dry and warm even in some slushy snow...and they look great! I get compliments all the time when I wear them with my jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Road Trip Traveller

customer_reviews.title: Cutest boots on the planet!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? They're adorable, they're comfortable to wear all day. They're slightly klunky but in an adorable sort of way, but not so heavy that you can't wear them for long periods of time. In fact these are the kind of boots that get more comfortable the more you wear them. I always get boots a half size bigger so I can put a comfort insole in them. Perfect! I also buy some silicone spray water proof spray (from amazon of course) and waterproof them so I don't have to worry about wearing them in rain or snow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing boot
customer_reviews.text: These boots are amazingly comfortable!! Do not order a size up ; my regular size 9.5 is a little large but with boot socks they are the most comfortable “cowboy “ boots I’ve ever owned. I do have to wear thick socks but if you plan on not wearing thick socks I’d say go down half a size.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Best Boots
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair. Once I find something that works for me, I stick w/ it. I found the sizing true. If you have wider feet, just rub some Neatsfoot oil on them & wear em for short periods of time, they’ll break in fast. I do wish the sole was alittle hardier, hence the 3rd pair.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Love the boots, but too big
customer_reviews.text: I love love these boots but they're too big.. I'd say size down. I normally wear size 7, a 6 would have fit better... I'm going to try to exchange these for a smaller size, if not I'll have to layer thick socks in order to wear them Edit: after changing so many sizes, I found my correct size and they're perfect. I love these boots so much. They're comfortable and easy to slip on. I wear them almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: GothFrau

customer_reviews.title: Asian made boot.
customer_reviews.text: Recieved from seller with either brown polish or leather stain trying to cover up wear marks. Wild west boot store
customer_reviews.author: Official Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Amazing boots
customer_reviews.text: I was a little sceptical at first about buying boots online since you can't try them on. The price made it worth the try to buy them online. When I received them and put them on I was amazed at the fit it was perfect. I love these boots. The fit, look and comfort are amazing. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Grose

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, not the same boot I used to get.
customer_reviews.text: Clearly, somewhere in the last ten years, this boot has been changed in how it’s made. I used to be Abel to take the insoles out and put mine in. Now they are glued in. The lining isn’t leather anymore either. It just felt like a completely different boot. I tried on several pairs from several places and same issue with them all.
customer_reviews.author: WaywardOctopus

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, quality, durable boots
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite everyday boots. They're super comfortable and durable. I walk miles in these on some days and they have never bothered my feet, they have good arch support. I live in a rural area and deal with everything from snow to rain to mud and dust. They clean up easy. I put olive oil on the leather part and they look great. I've had 3 pairs in 5 years and the quality has been consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara C.

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 1/2 size larger to get the right fit
customer_reviews.text: Ordering shoes/boots on line is always a challenge for me. I have a wide foot, so narrow toed shoes are out. These boots had to be ordered a half size larger for the foot to go through the top, but they are round toed and feel comfortable on the feet wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanna E. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Not All Fatbabies Are Created Equal
customer_reviews.text: These boots are cute, and they're fine to wear, but the bottoms of my feet start to hurt after an hour. I have a pair of Ariat Probaby boots that have ATS technology (air padded soles) and after looking, I found that some Fababy boots also have that, but these do not. I highly recommend looking for a pair with ATS - I have gone for hours, even went on a 4 hour hike in my others.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was undecided whether to get a 8.5 or 9 because depending on the shoe, it makes a difference on the fit. I used their sizing guide and got the 8.5 and they were perfect. I just can't wear thick socks with them at this point because they are too snug. But being leather, I know they will stretch out over time and they are made so well that I'm certain that they will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: SJones

customer_reviews.title: Leather was not usual quality. Super dry and ready to crack.
customer_reviews.text: Second time buying these in amazon. I have worn these boots for over 5 years. This is my 3rd pair. This is the first time I received boots with leather that looked dry and ready to crack. I had to condition them immediately and I have never had to do that with either of my other 2 pairs. Once conditioned they looked like they should, but they should have looked that way when I bought them. Makes me leery of the authenticity of the product as well as the stock that is being sold possibly being very old. Be advised!!!
customer_reviews.author: joanna mullen

product_meta.title: Ariat Women's Fatbaby Western Boot
product_meta.description:
Fatbaby pretty, and ready to compete. The 4LR technology adds comfort and stability, and the everly sole eases the feet; Delivering cushioning and wear-resistance. Four-row stitching and bold colors look great.

Ariat was founded with one simple objective: To provide the most technologically advanced riding boots for the world's top equestrian athletes. Today, Ariat is the leading performance footwear and apparel brand for equestrian athletes around the world. From show jumping to team penning, Ariat boots provide the foundation upon which world-class athletes work, ride, and compete.
feature_bullets: Premium full-grain leather foot w/ suede upper
Everlon combination EVA and blown rubber outsole
